channel.title: sillygwailo tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from sillygwailo.

item.description: @tomhawthorn There will be a section on Nat Bailey Stadium in my forthcoming book, Vancouver: The Good Parts.
Vladimir Guerrero Jr. is ridiculous.
@skinnylatte *tried to kill Rihanna

Tonight. https://t.co/5t0FL4fxXU
I had a really hard time with this movie. Russell was hilarious, though.
@geerlingguy Wait. It wasn‚Äôt DNS this time?
@uncleweed Kindness is insufficient.
@stephtara I‚Äôve been using it since 2014. It‚Äôs one of my favourite apps of all time.
@amye @BitIntegrity What about talking to the wine?

Can somebody tell me what my interests are? A woman is asking me and I can never seem to answer that question without people‚Äôs eyes glazing over.
I‚Äôm tempted to answer with ‚ÄúI own stocks through my RRSP, a little bit of cryptocurrency, and a single share of a sports club in British Columbia, and would own stock in the company I work for if it wasn‚Äôt for the mandatory options buyout,‚Äù but that‚Äôs not what she‚Äôs asking.
All of my interests are consumptive in nature. I haven‚Äôt made anything, or made anything happen, in a long time. Even with the things I have made, it rarely seems like people are as eager to talk about them as I am.

@BlueJayGal ü§î Apparently the runner must cross home plate or the game can‚Äôt start up again, but there‚Äôs also precedent for it being scored a triple if the player leaves the field after touching third base. https://t.co/J7Masm6mX8

@jeffjedras So far so good. I have a ticket to every home game in April, randomly assigned in the cheap seats. Pretty much right up my alley. I‚Äôll try to go to each game. Because it‚Äôs so cheap (and I‚Äôm a lapsed fan), I won‚Äôt feel the obligation to stick around for the entirety of each game.

This afternoon. https://t.co/K7VJYunOZ0
My view from the cheap seats. https://t.co/WXseABAvBF
It‚Äôs dinger season, baby.
Danny Jansen is a single and a triple away from the cycle, and those are the easiest hits to get.
How come I can‚Äôt buy a Teoscar Hern√°ndez shirsey from the official @BlueJays team store?
George Springer is a single and a triple away from the cycle, and those are the easiest hits to get.
I‚Äôd flip my hat into a rally cap if I brought it with me this time. I‚Äôm. I‚Äôm pretty sure that‚Äôs the reason why the Blue Jays are losing today.
Rangers win. https://t.co/93egJQCMUd
Pandemic milestone: Social anxiety is back at the top of my list of anxieties.
@martynschmoll @AnthonyFloyd https://t.co/eoCWRYSwpU

This afternoon. https://t.co/8KbQmQJQnu
I like this Santiago Espinal guy.
My view from the cheap seats. https://t.co/KEpSBOR4hl
It‚Äôs wild that Matt Bush is allowed entry into Canada.
Blue Jays win! https://t.co/91MByaIooF
How I‚Äôm watching baseball in 2022. https://t.co/QCYPm3fnVS

Tonight. https://t.co/qzANFNIieB
It‚Äôs my first time attending Opening Night! @BlueJays #NextLevel
It‚Äôs my first time attending Opening Night! @BlueJays #NextLevel #OpeningDay
My view from the cheap seats. https://t.co/nHYj5pqtee
@daringfireball I put together a calendar of the Apple TV+ Friday Night Baseball schedule that people can subscribe to, with the teams and game times. See the tweet below. https://t.co/NqEABKkxAa
I scan every QR code I see. https://t.co/an3ZDEM8fx
I‚Äôm gonna need a print of this. https://t.co/TUJFUP6Fzy
If I have to explain it, I‚Äôm probably embarrassed about it.
My developer account is now unblocked! As soon as I transfer over the @fullyjabbedCA project to that account, I‚Äôll get to work on on adding support for triple- and quadruple-jab percentages.

Count me as a part-owner of TSS Rovers Football Club. I bought exactly one share, and if I lose my investment, so be it. This feels like something I want to be a part of with a tie back to my home province. Go Rovers Go! @SOTR_Vancouver @swanguardians https://t.co/zfNZAnUsY5
I‚Äôll be giving away my season ticket, if indeed that‚Äôs the perk I get, hopefully earmarked for youths to attend.
If there‚Äôs any other sports club that has a 49% fan ownership model in Canada, especially if it has a youth team, and even more especially if it helps support young women and girls in athletics, please let me know. I want to be a part of that.
